titleStmt.title: The edict of the French King, for the appeasing of the troubles of his Realme Published at Paris in the court of Parliament the eleue[n]th of August. 1573. Printed in French by Frederic Morel the Kings ordinarie printer, with the Kings priuilege.
Proclamations. 1573-08-11.
titleStmt.author: France. Sovereign (1560-1574 : Charles IX)

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Edict du roy sur la pacification des troubles de ce royaume.
Running title reads: The French Kings last edict.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
